skills.name: Aether Jump
skills.description: Jump through the Aether to teleport to another position.

skills.name: Annihilation
skills.description: Channel a beam of Aether in front of you, damaging your foes. Turn speed while casting is increased proportionally to cast speed.

skills.name: Anomaly
skills.description: Cast a vortex that has two area of effects. The first, smaller areas deal damage over time, and after a short time the larger one pulls enemies into the center.

skills.name: Anvil's Woe
skills.description: Summon a colossal hammer and bring it down on your foes, dealing area damage.

skills.name: Arctic Spear
skills.description: After a delay, hurl an ice shard in a line.

skills.name: "Avenger" Autoturret
skills.description: Summon a turret to provide covering fire. Can be detached and wielded by holding the skill.

skills.name: Bladestorm
skills.description: Summon an enormous greatsword and cut a path through hordes of enemies, spinning to maintain momentum.

skills.name: Bleeding Edge
skills.description: Throw a spinning axe in a circle around you that deals damage. Base Physical damage converts into Rend damage.

skills.name: Blood for Blood
skills.description: Cast an area of effect on the ground that gives you a Rend damage bonus if you are not at full Health.

skills.name: Bulwark of Dawn
skills.description: Bless and area around you with light of dawn. It heals those who stand in it over time.

skills.name: Consuming Embers
skills.description: Summon a fireball and launch it in a straight line in front of you.

skills.name: "Deathgazer" Railgun
skills.description: Charge a sniper shot. As it is charged, its area of effect narrows and damage of the shot increases. Base Physical damage converts into Lightning damage.

skills.name: Duskshroud
skills.description: Drop a shadow cloud on the ground that grants invisibility and reduces Threat.

skills.name: Eclipse
skills.description: Cast a cone of Shadow force that knocks back enemies and destroys projectiles.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Dash in the opposite direction of the cursor and drop a projectile where the skill was activated that slows enemies. Base Physical damage converts into Shadow damage.

skills.name: Feeding Swarm
skills.description: Summon a zombie that deals damage with melee attacks. If the number of zombies is at a maximum, they charge towards the location of the cursor.

skills.name: Flight of Gaavanir
skills.description: Cast a flying hammer in the direction of the cursor, damaging enemies along its path. Hammer returns when cast again.

skills.name: Gunslinger's Brand
skills.description: Channel multiple shots and select targets by hovering over or clicking them. Shots are released when channeling stops or maximum number of shots is reached.

skills.name: Havoc Orb
skills.description: Target an area and launch an exploding device, dealing fire damage in an area of effect.

skills.name: Hunting Swarm
skills.description: Summon a zombie that deals damage with ranged attacks. If the number of zombies is at a maximum, they focus fire on the target underneath the cursor.

skills.name: Infinity Blades
skills.description: Attack enemies multiple times in a combo, giving Willpower with each enemy hit.

skills.name: Light-bringer
skills.description: Charge a Sacred spell that deals damage in an area of effect and teleports your character. At each new charging step, the area of effect and the damage are increased.

skills.name: Juggernaut
skills.description: Summon a shield that absorbs damage. The shield breaks at a damage threshold, damaging nearby enemies. If shield is re-cast, it explodes, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Livor Mortis
skills.description: Summon a large Poison golem that cleaves enemies. If the skill is cast again, golem shouts a warcry that generates Threat.

skills.name: Mark of Impurity
skills.description: Curses a target, increasing the damage it receives,

skills.name: Parasite
skills.description: Channel a ray on a target that leeches their health until they become possessed. Once possessed, the target's health is restored.

skills.name: Phantom Blades
skills.description: Throw a spinning dualblade in a line in front of you that damages enemies caught in its path.

skills.name: Plagueburst
skills.description: Cast an area of effect that causes enemies or summons to explode upon death, dealing Poison damage in an area of effect.

skills.name: Slayer's Flurry
skills.description: Summon two blades and dash forward to the target, dealing single target damage. Does not dash if used in melee range.

skills.name: Solarfall
skills.description: Channel a damaging area of effect from the sky that follows the cursor.

skills.name: Sovereign Shout
skills.description: Unleash a powerful warcry which buffs attack speed and cast speed for yourself and nearby allies.

skills.name: Stings of Krearion
skills.description: Summon an imposing bow and launch several piercing arrows at once.

skills.name: Tear of Etheliel
skills.description: A mass of ice forms above your enemies. After a short delay, it falls from the sky for huge damage.

skills.name: Thunderstrike
skills.description: Electrocute your foes with bouncing lightning. Each bounce is weaker than the last.

skills.name: Tracker's Reach
skills.description: Throw a chained hook forward and pull back all the foes it went through.

skills.name: Wailing Arrows
skills.description: Let loose a volley of arrows in a circular area that damages enemies over time.

skills.name: Warpath
skills.description: Summon a mighty shield and charge through your enemies, breaking their ranks.

skills.name: Wings of Ishmir
skills.description: Summon a giant spear and leap onto your enemies, damaging them.

skills.name: Winter's Grasp
skills.description: An ice nova emanates around you and freezes your enemies.

skills.name: Wrath of Baapheth
skills.description: Summon a pair of unbreakable chains and unleash a flurry of reckless lashes.
